channel.title: Korea on Kevin Conley's Web Presence
channel.description: Recent content in Korea on Kevin Conley's Web Presence

item.title: Korea - Day Three
item.description: This post is part of a series of journals I wrote while traveling to Seoul, South Korea to compete in the 2010 World Embedded Software Contest, for which my team’s project won the grand prize.
